subject: Re: Pro Plus Pedals - Hydraulic Rods
description_text:
Thank you for the quick response.

I have also noticed the tutorial video and manual links are broken on your
website for the pro plus pedals. If you could send me a pdf of the manual
that would be greatly appreciated.

Amazon order number as below:
701-5674630-8209805

Photo included.





On Fri, May 30, 2025, 8:48 PM support <support@simsonn.com> wrote:

>
> Could you please provide a photo of the product and your order number? We
> will verify the details and get back to you with a solution as soon as
> possible!
> ​
> ---- Replied Message ----
> From Adam Benoit<benoit.adam.marc@gmail.com> <benoit.adam.marc@gmail.com>
> Date 05/31/2025 06:50
> To support@simsonn.com<support@simsonn.com> <support@simsonn.com>
> Subject Pro Plus Pedals - Hydraulic Rods
> Hello,
>
> I just received the Pro Plus pedals and am wondering about the hydraulic
> rods. My kit did not appear to include these rods, although it seems they
> were noted in the product description on Amazon.
>
> Just looking for clarification on if these were supposed to be included or
> not. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
>
> Thanks
> Adam
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Adam Benoit,  Hello, you purchased the version without the hydraulic damper. Our Amazon customer service has already explained this to you. If you need the hydraulic damper, it can be purchased separately.
